text: Jorge Bruni (1941 – 13 December 2020) was an Uruguayan politician. He was the Minister of the Interior from 2009 to 2010 during the Tabaré Vázquez presidency. He was a member of the Broad Front Party. Bruni died on 13 December 2020 in Montevideo at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Uruguayan politicians
title: Jorge Bruni
